lead_paragraph: An article on Monday about the relationship between Jimmy Jerkens, a trainer who was considering entering a horse in the Kentucky Derby, and his father, Allen, a Hall of Fame trainer, misidentified the New York area racetrack where the elder Jerkens plans to be on Saturday before heading home to watch the Derby on television. It is Belmont Park — not Aqueduct, which will have no racing that day.
